of Telecommuting in Solaris 10 was used utilizing virtualization of the various Solaris 10 servers MS SQL 2005 conversions and implementations across the Enterprise setting up table spaces and DB searches along with datamining They were then placed in containers for ease of administration and portability All zones implemented were the Whole Route Zone please note due to the size of this organization this was needed All work dispensed via Remedy Designed and implemented server architecture for improved operational resiliency and performance Achieved 60 reduction of data center costs through the introduction of the following initiatives carried out on production environment Install configure and support 500 IBM AIX pSeries Red Hat RH9 and RHEL35 Fedora and SuSE systems in several enterprise environments providing mission critical Telecom Application support Act as Lead Linux Engineer handling majority of Linux builds troubleshooting and applications Installed and maintain RHEL
